Question.Subject: what legible site can i use to download a faster internet?
Question.Content:
also what kind of internet should i get? ie; firefox, google chrome, etc..
since when i go on youtube, twitter, etc sites they keep saying that i need a not a faster but a more modern browser.....
Question.ChosenAnswer:
This does not make sense.
Firefox, IE, etc are browsers and have no effect on how fast your internet is. Your ISP determines your internet speed. Usually u pay more for faster speeds.
And if those sites are complaining about your browser, just download the latest version of whatever browser u like and install it.

And if those sites are complaining about your browser, just download the latest version of whatever browser u like and install it.
